Posts.Content: Sep 11, 2008 11:42PM PEnTE wrote: Dear Ladies, Have any of you experienced tightness in the arm on the side where your port was installed?  I just had mine installed on 8 Sep along with resection of my right breast.  Port is on my left side.  I'll start chemo on 29 Sep.  I also developed a dry cough and metallic taste in my month along with feeling like I need to take deep breaths every now and then...any insight or similar symptoms??  Thanks so much!! Patti
